titles.title: A resolution celebrating the 45th anniversary of the Senate Black Legislative Staff Caucus and its achievements in the Senate.
A resolution celebrating the 45th anniversary of the Senate Black Legislative Staff Caucus and its achievements in the Senate.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.
Senate Committee on Rules and Administration discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution honors the Senate Black Legislative Staff Caucus for its contributions to the Senate.
